text: Édith Moskovic (12 August 1931 – 8 June 2021) was a Hungarian-born French Holocaust survivor and activist. In 2009, she was made a knight of the Legion of Honor. Moskovic was sent to the Camp du Récébédou from 1941 until 1942, when she escaped after bribing the guards. Moskovic died on 8 June 2021 in Montpellier, France at the age of 89. ==References== Category:Holocaust survivors Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French activists
title: Édith Moskovic
